nodes.text: Viidaav was a planet located in the Bryx sector of the Mid Rim. It was inhabited by the Viidaav species.
Viidaav was the site of a Separatist base during the early stages of the Clone Wars, until it was found by Republic scouts.
In 19 BBY, Count Dooku and General Grievous allowed the Republic to land their clone troopers on Viidaav in order to spring a trap.
